name: down_payment_verification_uploader
title: Please upload documents verifying the funds for your down payment.
label: Uploader
description: If you don't have the documents ready, you can skip for now.
tips: Common verification documents include bank statements, investment account statements, or a letter from your financial institution.
small_print: Make sure to black out all account numbers and addresses from the Verification of Funds (VOF) and that all other information is clear and legible. We may request additional documentation if needed.

internal.notes: Document upload for down payment verification

down_payment_verification_uploader.name: down_payment_verification_uploader

suggested.hint: Since you chose to provide proof of funds as part of your offer, uploading will be required to complete your offer.
